Description: Term Frequency (TF) vocabulary of vectorized of the commit messages
Count of words in the commit messages
Count of sentences in the commit messages
Flesch readability score of the commit messages
Number of lines added in the commit
Number of lines deleted in the commit
Number of files modified in the commit
Shannon's entropy of the code in the commit
Refactoring commits of the author (i) / All commits of the author (i)
Presence of executable files in the commit
above are the metrics supported by understand in Python code
